test.command: cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE=$(SQ)$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)$(SQ) -DJAVA_HOME=$(SQ)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(SQ) -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)functional$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-1.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JDK_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(BITS) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE=$(SQ)$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)$(SQ) -DJAVA_HOME=$(SQ)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(SQ) -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)functional$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-2.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JDK_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)TokenHelperTests$(D)TokenHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true TokenHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf TokenHelperTests.jar; \ cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)DataHelperTests$(D)DataHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true DataHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf DataHelperTests.jar; \ $(CONVERT_TO_EBCDIC_CMD) \ $(CD) $(Q)$(TESTOUTPUT)$(D)$@$(D)datacaching$(D)dataone.contents$(Q); \ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) cf dataone.jar *.txt; \ $(CD) $(REPORTDIR); \ $(CD) $(Q)$(TESTOUTPUT)$(D)$@$(D)datacaching$(D)datatwo.contents$(Q); \ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) cf datatwo.jar *.txt; \ $(CD) $(REPORTDIR); \ mv $(Q)$(TESTOUTPUT)$(D)$@$(D)datacaching$(D)dataone.contents$(D)dataone.jar$(Q) $(Q)$(TESTOUTPUT)$(D)$@$(D)datacaching$(Q); \ mv $(Q)$(TESTOUTPUT)$(D)$@$(D)datacaching$(D)datatwo.contents$(D)datatwo.jar$(Q) $(Q)$(TESTOUTPUT)$(D)$@$(D)datacaching$(Q); \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE=$(SQ)$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)$(SQ) -DJAVA_HOME=$(SQ)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(SQ) -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)functional$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-3.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JDK_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE=$(SQ)$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)$(SQ) -DJAVA_HOME=$(SQ)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(SQ) -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DJDMPVIEW_EXE=$(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jdmpview$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)functional$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-4.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JDK_VERSION),$(JCL_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE=$(SQ)$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)$(SQ) -DJAVA_HOME=$(SQ)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(SQ) -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DJDMPVIEW_EXE=$(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jdmpview$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)functional$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-5.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JDK_VERSION),$(JCL_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)..$(D)..$(D)cmdline_options_testresources$(D)cmdlinetestresources.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf cmdlinetestresources.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE=$(SQ)$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)$(SQ) -DJAVA_HOME=$(SQ)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(SQ) -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DJDMPVIEW_EXE=$(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jdmpview$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) \ -DUTILSDIR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)functional$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)testSCCMLSoftmx.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JDK_VERSION),$(JCL_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

cp $(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)functional$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) .; \ true utils.jar ;\ $(Q)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf utils.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE=$(SQ)$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)$(SQ) -DJAVA_HOME=$(SQ)$(TEST_JDK_HOME)$(SQ) -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)functional$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)SharedClassesModularityTests.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JDK_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

test.disabled: SharedClasses by default is disabled from the 0.12.0 release while we work through some performance issues related to lost iprofiler data. See issue: https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/issues/4222
